Text:
First of all - I really appreciate you posting so much Armin - he is the best DJ in the world.  But the date for this gig is not correct, if by "03-09-2010" you mean September 3rd.

Why?  Because on September 3rd he was in Atlanta playing at Opera.  I was 10 feet behind the stage the whole night.

Perhaps this was his 08/31 gig in Ibiza?

You have right.
This set was recorded on August 3rd but it was broadcasted from Sirius XM on September 3rd.
Best Regards
